title: H.A.M. Deacon

properties.name: description
properties.value: The H.A.M. Deacon is a non-interactive NPC and a speaker in the Humans Against Monsters cult. He preaches to members of the group in their cave below Misthalin, spreading propaganda and hatred against monsters. The H.A.M. members in the audience before him will always agree with what he says. Like the leader of the group, Johanhus Ulsbrecht, he wears dark H.A.M. robes. He is apparently a senior member of the cult, as he and Sigmund toasted to the drill during the Death to the Dorgeshuun quest.

The H.A.M. Deacon is a non-interactive NPC and a speaker in the Humans Against Monsters cult. He preaches to members of the group in their cave below Misthalin, spreading propaganda and hatred against monsters. The H.A.M. members in the audience before him will always agree with what he says. Like the leader of the group, Johanhus Ulsbrecht, he wears dark H.A.M. robes. He is apparently a senior member of the cult, as he and Sigmund toasted to the drill during the Death to the Dorgeshuun quest.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.
